message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.DL, cs.LG, cs.CY

The paper discusses the task of automatically detecting citation importance based on the full text of publications, which is a common problem in information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The analysis of features used in this task involves machine learning techniques such as deep learning (cs.DL) and statistical modeling (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper discusses the challenges and potential improvements in the classification pipeline, which is relevant to the field of cybersecurity (cs.CY) where automated detection and classification of threats is a critical task.
